quote: My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise
O you who have believed, persevere and endure and remain stationed and fear Allah that you may be successful.
And hasten to forgiveness from your Lord and a garden as wide as the heavens and earth, prepared for the righteous
O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
Then is one who was a believer like one who was defiantly disobedient? They are not equal.
Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established.
Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
And who is better in speech than one who invites to Allah and does righteousness and says, "Indeed, I am of the Muslims." ?
The angel of death will take you who has been entrusted with you. Then to your Lord you will be returned.
